text: David Garrett (born 4 September 1980) is a German classical violinist. He studied at the Royal College of Music in London and graduated from Juilliard School in New York City. There he was one of the first students to study under Itzhak Perlman. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Classical violinists Category:Musicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:People from Aachen Category:German violinists
title: David Garrett
